data.name: Dominion - Black Market
data.detailed_description:
When you want your Dominion with some extra Dominion on the side, reach for the Black Market! This card lets players buy Kingdom cards not included in the supply for the current game.

Black Market is the only card that allows players to Buy cards during their Action phase. Some very unusual combos can arise, it can lead to games including an eleventh pile or Ruins pile, even without a Young Witch or Looter in the supply, if the Black Market contains one of these cards.

Dominion cards can generally be organized as trashers, gainers, Action branchers, etc. Black Market is the one card that defies categorization. It is known as one of the most high variance cards among all Dominion cards ever published. For example, if there is a Witch in the Black Market pile, there may be a game where only one player manages to get it and can curse other players.


Black Market can be especially valuable in games that reward diverse decks. It can be used to fill in the gaps in a supply low on one thing, such as card draw.

This card especially benefits from a digital implementation, where players do not have to manually organize (and put away) a Black Market deck. All setup is automatic, making the Black Market an ideal card for your digital collection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
